Metadata: The SandBar (Volume 19:2, April 2020): Legal Reporter for the National Sea Grant Law Center

The SandBar is a quarterly publication reporting on legal issues affecting the U.S. oceans and coasts. Its goal is to increase awareness and understanding of coastal issues. In Issue 1, January 2020: Court Restores Ban On Gillnet Fishing Gear in North Atlantic Right Whale Habitat; The EPA Takes Action on Regulating Lead: What is the New Proposed Trigger Level?; Shell-Shocked in Seattle: Court Sets Aside Federal Aquaculture Permit Scheme in Washington; City’s Short-Term Rental Ordinance Here to Stay; 2019 Legislative Update.
